page.title: 18What people do
page.content: Our simple survey showed that there are not many jobs in White Notley and that most people who are at work trave to their job. We found that several people work in the building trade as bricklayers, carpenters or as painters and decorators. Some people travel to office work in Chelmsford, Colchester or even in London. Others work in factory jobs; some of them nearby such as Silver End but others much farther away such as Dagenham. There are also some who work at various jobs at Black Notley Hospital. There is a lot of concern that this hospital which is the nearest to White Notley may soon close. Unemployment does not seem to be a very big problem in our area.
